c74object.name: recursivefolder
c74object.digest: Recursively list the files in a specific folder
c74object.description: recursivefolder is similar to the folder object, but unlike folder it is possible to search recursively. Recursion can either be infinite (default), or to a specified depth. See the folder object help file for info on pathnames in MaxMSP.

objarg.name: recursion-depth
objarg.description: An optional int sets recursion depth (0 is default - ie. infinite recursion).

objarg.name: symbol
objarg.description: Any additional optional symbols set types to search for.

method.name: anything
method.digest: Set the file path to output
method.description: Any symbol or message starting with a symbol with the path will set the file path of which the contents will be output.

method.name: symbol
method.digest: Set the file path to output
method.description: Performs the same function as anything.

method.name: bang
method.description: A bang will output the folder contents again.

method.name: int
method.description: Performs the same function as bang.

method.name: types
method.description:
The types message allows you to list only certain types of file. Files have a four-character file type (case sensitive).
types TEXT - text files
types JSON - Max patches
types iLaX - external objects
types AIFF WAV - sound files
types MooV - movies

entry.name: symbol
entry.description: Outputs the paths of all found files.
